text: Ini: "maday, sennig Öebbi akked Umazan iS, akked umennu$ deg ubrid iS, ay têemmlem ibabaten nnwen, tarwa nnwen, atmaten nnwen, tilawin nnwen, alag nnwen, ayla i tkesbem, ttjaôa i tugadem a ppe$li, tinezdu$in i kwen iâaoben, ihi, gganit ar d Ias Öebbi, s lameô iS. Öebbi ur Inehhu agdud iballa$en.
